title: 2D-rGO-supported FePc bifunctional nanozyme with enhanced catalytic activity for thiosulfate detection and rhodamine B degradation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00119B, Paper
Feijin Zhou, Wenying Cui, Chenggang Liu, Cheng Yao, Chan Song
FePc supported on 2D rGO has the enhanced catalytic activity. The prepared FePc@rGO nanocomposites not only can catalyze the oxidation of colorimetric substrates, but also can degrade RhB with the help of PMS.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
